summary: The filmed account of a large Canadian rock festival train tour boasting major acts like Janis Joplin, The Grateful Dead and The Band.
cast: Rick Danko|Levon Helm|Garth Hudson|Richard Manuel|Robbie Robertson|Bonnie Bramlett|Delaney Bramlett|Ben Benay|Sam Clayton|Jim Gordon|Kenny Gradney|Jerry Jumonville|Darrell Leonard|Frank Maize|Chuck Morgan|Mike Clarke|Chris Hillman|Pete Kleinow|Bernie Leadon|Jerry Garcia|Mickey Hart|Bill Kreutzmann|Phil Lesh|Ron McKernan|Bob Weir|Buddy Guy|Phil Guy|Leroy Stewart|A.C. Reed|Roosevelt 'Snake' Shaw|Ian Tyson|Sylvia Tyson|Buddy Cage|Jim Colegrove|Amos Garrett|N.D. Smart|Richard Bell|Brad Campbell|Janis Joplin|Ken Pearson|Clark Pierson|John Till|Rayburn Blake|Brian Edwards|Jerry Mercer|Pierre Sénécal|Donald 'Donny' York|Jocko Marcellino|'Screamin' Scott' Simon|Lennie Baker|Jon 'Bowzer' Bauman|Elliot Cahn|Bruce Clarke|Frederick 'Dennis' Greene|Larry Packer|Richard T. Joffe|Scott Powell|Eric Andersen|Rob Bowman|James Cullingham|David Dalton|Ken Walker|The Band|Grateful Dead|Terry David Mulligan|Sha-Na-Na|Leslie West
title: Festival Express
